New Records: The Celtics set a new largest victory margin with a 35-point lead over the Knicks.
Key Match Events: The Celtics had 11 fast break points compared to the Knicks' 4, indicating effective break-down play.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the first meeting of the season between the Celtics and Knicks.
Others: The game was covered by TNT and held at TD Garden in Boston with an attendance of 19,156.
